lead_paragraph: Felony assault charges were refiled against two Penn State football players, two weeks after a judge dismissed the same charges at a preliminary hearing. Defensive tackle Chris Baker and linebacker Navorro Bowman were charged Wednesday with being part of a group of people that beat a man Oct. 7. Centre County District Attorney Michael Madeira said District Judge Carmine Prestia erred when he dropped the charges.
